summary: Completed comprehensive testing of L'Éclaireur application - PDF document analysis tool for Quebec workers. Backend APIs and frontend interface are fully functional.

minor_issues.issue: CORS headers not visible in OPTIONS response
minor_issues.impact: May affect cross-origin requests in some browsers

passed_tests: Backend /api/analyze accepts multipart/form-data and validates PDF files
Frontend loads correctly with PDF upload zone
Sun logo displays correctly in header
Upload zone with drag & drop functionality present
File select button 'Sélectionner un fichier' is functional
File input correctly configured for PDF files only
Security note displays with anonymization information
Footer contains all required links (CNESST, TAT, avocat, médecins)
Drag and drop text displays correctly
File format hint shows PDF and 60 Mo limit
No JavaScript errors on page load
